favourites.name: A midsummernight dream
favourites.description: Mix the strawberrys in a blender Pour it together with the vodka,kirch and strawberry liquer over ice in a shaker. Shake well and pour in a highballglass. Fill up with the Russchian water

favourites.name: Mojito #3
favourites.description: Put mint with lemon juice in a glas, mash the mint with a spoon, ice, rum & fill up with club soda. Top it with Angostura.
